titles.title: Affordable Electric Vehicles for America Act of 2022
Affordable Electric Vehicles for America Act of 2022

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to temporarily suspend application of the requirement that final assembly of vehicles occur within North America for purposes of the clean vehicle credit, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Affordable Electric Vehicles for America Act of 2022
This bill extends until after 2025 the requirement that final assembly of vehicles occur within North America for purposes of the clean vehicle tax credit.
